Title: Prohibits the operation of a motorcycle with any child under the age of 6 thereon, unless the child is seated in a sidecar
Summary: Prohibits the operation of a motorcycle with any child under the age of 6 thereon, unless the child is seated in a sidecar.
LawCode: Amd ยง1251, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting children under the age of six years from riding on a motorcycle
